content:
Craft an item of type: birch_trapdoor
inventory=[{"type": "magenta_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "smooth_red_sandstone_stairs", "quantity": 10, "index": 17}, {"type": "crimson_roots", "quantity": 41, "index": 22}, {"type": "stripped_birch_wood", "quantity": 2, "index": 24}, {"type": "purple_terracotta", "quantity": 21, "index": 25}, {"type": "stone", "quantity": 34, "index": 38}, {"type": "redstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 42}, {"type": "warped_roots", "quantity": 25, "index": 44}, {"type": "dead_brain_coral_block", "quantity": 59, "index": 45}]
thought: To craft birch_trapdoor, I need to craft birch_planks which require birch_wood. I have 2 stripped_birch_wood in slot 24, so I will move one of them to the crafting table.
Ok
act: move from slot 24 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: birch_trapdoor
inventory=[{"type": "birch_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "stripped_birch_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "magenta_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "smooth_red_sandstone_stairs", "quantity": 10, "index": 17}, {"type": "crimson_roots", "quantity": 41, "index": 22}, {"type": "stripped_birch_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 24}, {"type": "purple_terracotta", "quantity": 21, "index": 25}, {"type": "stone", "quantity": 34, "index": 38}, {"type": "redstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 42}, {"type": "warped_roots", "quantity": 25, "index": 44}, {"type": "dead_brain_coral_block", "quantity": 59, "index": 45}]
thought: I now have enough birch_planks to craft the birch_trapdoor, so I will move them from the crafting table to an empty slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4

Craft an item of type: birch_trapdoor
inventory=[{"type": "birch_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 11}, {"type": "magenta_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "smooth_red_sandstone_stairs", "quantity": 10, "index": 17}, {"type": "crimson_roots", "quantity": 41, "index": 22}, {"type": "stripped_birch_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 24}, {"type": "purple_terracotta", "quantity": 21, "index": 25}, {"type": "stone", "quantity": 34, "index": 38}, {"type": "redstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 42}, {"type": "warped_roots", "quantity": 25, "index": 44}, {"type": "dead_brain_coral_block", "quantity": 59, "index": 45}]

thought: To craft a birch trapdoor, I need to craft birch planks. To craft birch planks, I need to place the stripped birch wood in the crafting grid. I will start by moving the stripped birch wood to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 24 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: birch_trapdoor
inventory=[{"type": "birch_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "stripped_birch_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "birch_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 11}, {"type": "magenta_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "smooth_red_sandstone_stairs", "quantity": 10, "index": 17}, {"type": "crimson_roots", "quantity": 41, "index": 22}, {"type": "purple_terracotta", "quantity": 21, "index": 25}, {"type": "stone", "quantity": 34, "index": 38}, {"type": "redstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 42}, {"type": "warped_roots", "quantity": 25, "index": 44}, {"type": "dead_brain_coral_block", "quantity": 59, "index": 45}]
thought: Now that the stripped birch wood has been placed in the crafting grid, I can craft birch planks by moving them to a free slot (eg., 12).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 12 with quantity 4

Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1
